crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_type != 'number' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {state: doc.pvt_state||doc.pvt_number_state, features: (typeof doc.pvt_features !== 'undefined') ? Object.keys(doc.pvt_features) : [], assigned_to: doc.pvt_assigned_to, used_by: doc.pvt_used_by, created: doc.pvt_created, updated: doc.pvt_modified, locality: doc.pvt_locality});}
